about_the_game:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in the pin-up scenes. Additionally, you can also choose to see more revealing outfits. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen which will let you toggle between suggestive contents on and off, and 4 buttons for the 4 love interests to toggle the outfit type.

Requires the main game Tales Of Aravorn: An Elven Marriage to download

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains tasteful uncensored sex scenes, as well as nudity.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 21.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content.

detailed_description:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in the pin-up scenes. Additionally, you can also choose to see more revealing outfits. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen which will let you toggle between suggestive contents on and off, and 4 buttons for the 4 love interests to toggle the outfit type.

Requires the main game Tales Of Aravorn: An Elven Marriage to download
